email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CFR terms. The vessel proposed is the PACIFIC TRADER, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th October, and the initial freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 24.00 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24.75 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Tubarão on 15th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers
